Professional Projects

Elevated Third 2020-present

https://www.transamerica.com/
  Transamerica - A large financial website
  • Lead Developer of post launch features and support
  • Creation custom micro site functionality
  Pardot Module - A contributed module that provide integration with Pardot and connecting form handlers to contact forms and webforms.
  • Connection to the Pardot API to provide pre-built field mappings to user
  • Connection to the API to track visitor page visits
  • Utilization of the Drupal plugin system to provide more flexibility and extendability
  • Out of the box integration with webforms and contact forms
  Harsco Environmental - SteelPhalt - A collection of websites that revolve around industrial waste management and recycling.
  • Build of original site and all the base functionality for cohesion to the subsequent sites
  Overlake Hospital - A redesign of a medium sized website for a users to find information, locations, and medical care providers.
  • Implementation of a javascript applications that utilize a Algolia backend

Able Engine 2017-present

  Alltech - Alltech is a large multilingual Drupal 8 site. I maintain this site and provide new features and improvements.
  • Implementation of the batch api for duplicating content, blocks, taxonomies, and terms for new languages
  • Custom module to provide a vast array of blocks for layout out content
  Alltech Dealer Portal - The Dealer Portal (Drupal 8) provides a way for "dealers" to order materials to help them sell products. I build this project from the ground up and implemented all features.
  • Customizable pdfs via Pdf field detection and custom pdf form generation for users to input text and images to be placed in the pdf
  • Csv script for importing data that keeps track of users sales and points.
  Informed Sites (has not launched) - This project is actually a collection of 5 websites built on Drupal 8 all leveraging one upstream. I was the sole developer of this project.
  • Integrations to layout builder to allow for flexibility and customization across all sites and provide a way to create "global layouts"
  • Custom settings for generation of pdfs, and controlling sites appearance
  • Csv manipulation, data merging, generation, and data importing for managing "batches"
  Farmers National Bank - Farmers National Bank is a small bank website built on Drupal 8.
  Casino Platform - A custom wordpress theme and plugin used on a multitude of sites to provide one code base for updates and functionality.
  ExecuTrain - A wordpress site where users can browse a list of available courses and sign a person or group up to attend.
  • Customized Woocommerce integration
  • React Based reporting and analytics

Personal Projects

  Name-Spy - A web application for non-profits to make automatic inquiries on a specially designated nationals list. Built with Laravel, Vue.js, and deployed on heroku.
  Memory Game - A Memory Game built with AngularJS.
  Calulator - A basic calculator built with simple HTML CSS & JS.
